#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int i,j;

int main2[10] ={0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9}; 
int sum(int a){
	int ret1=0;i=a;
	while(i){ret1+=main2[i%10];i/=10;} 
	return ret1%10;
	}
	
	int range(int a,int b){  int ret=0;for(int j=a;j<=b;j++) ret+=sum(j);
	return ret;}
int main() {int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{int a,b,ans;
  
  //cout<<sum(23);
  scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
    
  ans= (45*(b/10-a/10) + range((b/10)*10,b) - range((a/10)*10,a-1));
  cout<<ans<<endl; 
	
}
	
	return 0;
}
